title: Choice Health Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Wellness lounge with an open kitchen and laid back atmosphere. Offers a mostly vegan lunchtime raw food menu with a cooked grain bowl plus daily warm soups. Food is vegan except for honey in a few smoothies and desserts. Find superfood smoothies, acai bowls, kale salad, raw entrees, veggie sushi, and raw desserts. Also sells a small range of health products. Has Wi-Fi. Evening dinners no longer available as of May 2016.
